post.author: 임기순

comment.author: 황성규
comment.content: 로저스 홈폰 2년째 쓰는데요 아무 불편없어요 지금까지. 그런데 로저스홈폰이 VOIP인지는 모르겠네요. 참 가격은 벨이랑 별 차이 없는듯.

post.content:
I am using Cogeco cable services for Internet and Cable TV. I am considering Cogeco cable Home Phone as well. In terms of price, it's better than Bell due to discount. My question is related to whether additional phone equipments are needed or any issues ( e.g voice quality, reliability etc). I think most of the GTA areas are using Rogers than Cogeco. Rogers experience will be similar.
Your input will be appreciated.
post.title: Home Phone service from Cable company
